alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Heavy thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cattaraugus and central Chautauqua Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of thunderstorms with torrential rainfall and reduced visibility along a line extending from Mayville to Cassadaga to South Dayton and Cattaraugus. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westfield, Gowanda, Ashford, Mayville, Ashford Hollow, Chautauqua Institution, Findley Lake, Long Point State Park, Chautauqua, Portland, Ripley, Stockton, New Albion, Dayton, Brocton, Leon, Mina, East Otto, Arkwright and Cattaraugus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 61 and 60. Interstate 86 between exits 4 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
